channel.title: Steam decided to not connect anymore
channel.description: It happened out of nowhere. I couldn't connect for 4 days now.

item.title: Steam decided to not connect anymore
item.dc:creator: Power_Dust
item.description:
I just logged into Steam right now but it took about three minutes until it has started to connect. :hmph:

item.title: Steam decided to not connect anymore
item.dc:creator: sersoft
item.description:
FFFUUU:

WHY WOULD I EVEN MAKE THIS THREAD IF I DIDN’T HAVE A PROBLEM?! SHOULD I INVITE YOU OVER TO MY HOUSE AND SHOW YOU?!

Yes show me where all the valuable objects in your house are placed. :3

BTW did you make sure that your PC has the correct time and date set up? Make sure it’s at least the right date and time zone (in Windows).

If it still doesn’t work try deleting clientregistry.blob in the Steam folder.

Medevilae:

You missed “updated 06 part,” didn’t you?

I think you missed the joke, US and Canada are in the same time zones.

Read full topic

item.title: Steam decided to not connect anymore
item.dc:creator: zap12341
item.description:
FFFUUU:

Yeah, turns out that the servers in the Eastern region of the US are bad. https://www.steampowered.com/status/content_servers.html

Edit: It says “This page last updated: 1:30pm PST (21:30 GMT), September 18 2006”. Ugh

It just says that it can’t connect.

thank god I live in Canada:freeman:

Read full topic

item.title: Steam decided to not connect anymore
item.dc:creator: FFFUUU
item.description:
No no, it hasn’t. Trust me. It doesn’t say anything like “Wrong password” or some shit like that. I do remember me being able to log in one time, but when I would start a game, it would say “Steam servers too busy trollololol”. So I restarted ny PC and again it won’t even let me log in. Reinstalled and everything.

Read full topic
item.source: Steam decided to not connect anymore

item.title: Steam decided to not connect anymore
item.dc:creator: bigfan421
item.description:
I think your steam account has been stolen, FFFUUU. you’re saying that you’ve been unable to log into steam for the last five days, yet the board’s steam card application says you last logged on eighteen hours ago. Go to the support page and create a ticket saying that you believe your steam account has been stolen this part is Very fucking important, so pay attention include in the report 1) the account’s login name (separate from what people see in-game) 2) the last three games added to the account 3) credit card information from credit cards used to purchase games on steam and 4) any changes made to the account thereafter.
You might also want to include names of individuals who “promised” you admin powers on their servers (I was tricked by the bastard too)

Read full topic
